org.openmuc.jdlms

Class SnClientConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmuc.jdlms.SnClientConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.openmuc.jdlms.internal.transportlayer.TransportLayerConnectionListener

    public class SnClientConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Variant of the connection class using decrypt messages with short name referencing to communicate with the remote smart meter

      • set

        public java.util.List<AccessResultCode> set(long timeout,
                                   boolean highPriority,
                                   SetRequestParameter... params)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Requests the remote smart meter to set one or several attributes to the committed values
        Parameters:
        timeout - Amount of milliseconds waited before the request is aborted
        highPriority - Sends this request with high priority, if supported
        params - Varargs of specifier which attributes to set to which values (See SetRequestParameter)
        Returns:
        List of results from the smart meter in the same order as the requests or null if confirmed has been set to false on creation of this object. A true value indicates that this particular value has been successfully set
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws IOException

      • action

        public java.util.List<MethodResult> action(boolean highPriority,
                                  MethodRequestParameter... params)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Requests the remote smart meter to call one or several methods with or without committed parameters
        Parameters:
        highPriority - Sends this request with high priority, if supported
        params - List of specifier which methods to be called and, if needed, what parameters to call (See MethodRequestParameter
        Returns:
        List of results from the smart meter in the same order as the requests or null if confirmed has been set to false on creation of this object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection breaks, while requesting

        public java.util.List<GetResult> get(boolean highPriority,
                            GetRequestParameter... params)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Requests the remote smart meter to send the values of one or several attributes
        Parameters:
        highPriority - if true: sends this request with high priority, if supported
        params - Varargs of specifiers which attributes to send (See GetRequestParameter)
        Returns:
        List of results from the smart meter in the same order as the requests
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the connection breaks

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(boolean sendDisconnectMessage)
        Disconnects connection to remote smart meter
        Parameters:
        sendDisconnectMessage - If a message to release the connection shall be sent to the remote client. This parameter must be true on connectionless lower layer protocols (e.g. UDP) or if you want to give the remote end point a chance to gracefully close the connection
